xxl.core.collections.containers
Class VerificationContainer

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.collections.containers.AbstractContainer
      xxl.core.collections.containers.ConstrainedDecoratorContainer
          xxl.core.collections.containers.VerificationContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Container
public class VerificationContainer
extends ConstrainedDecoratorContainer

Verifies each write operation of a container, that means for example after an insert, the object is retrieved again with get and both objects are compared (using the equals method from Object). If an operation fails a RuntimeException is thrown.

Field Summary
 long numberOfActions
          Internal numbering of actions that write data (insert/update/remove).
